entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending after midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 late this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 30%
